comments: He\'s a great professor. He knows his subject really well and it\'s clear he has a passion for teaching this subject. Follow his instructions, do the work, turn it in on time and you will do fine.

Very good prof. I first hated his class because I found it so boring and he seem so strict but over time I started to enjoy it. You will watch a lot of videos and read a lot but if you respect, do your assignments ON TIME & put work into your paper you will get your deserve grade.. Fair grader! I will take him anytime!

He is a good professor. He knows his stuff but sometimes if he tells you too much you may want to rage quit. But if you use the textbook and ask questions there is no reason you shouldn\'t get a B. He will answer your questions and give you chances. He\'s human. I would take him again to get the bang for my buck. This is college after all.
HE IS STRAIGHT FOWARD PERSON DONT ASK HIM ABOUT ANYTHING HE TOLD YOU ALREADY HE WILL GET ANGRY!
His class can be a little boring especially if you are not going to be a librarian. But you do learn a lot from him. I enjoyed taking his class.

Everyone in the class seemed to have a problem with him,hes a good guy, he has a boring topic to teach. Yes it was hard to stay awake sometimes but, its 3 pretty easy credits. I really dont have anything bad to say about him. Hes very fair and is a pretty cool guy outside class.
Name says it all. He sucks as a professor so if you get him..look for another professor
